channel.title: jQuery Effects on JavaScript
channel.description: Recent content in jQuery Effects on JavaScript

item.title: .show() & .hide()
item.description: .show() & .hide() Methods .hide() Method used to hide targeted elements Example $(() => { $("button").click(() => { // hide #box element $("#box").hide() }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com .show() $(() => { $("button").click(() => { // show #box element $("#box").show() }) }) Method used to show targeted elements that are currently hidden JS Bin on jsbin.com

item.title: .toggle()
item.description: .toggle() Method Method that shows or hides element in such a way that if the element is initially displayed, it will be hidden; if hidden, it will be displayed Example $(() => { $("button").click(() => { // toggle #box element $("#box").toggle() }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com

item.title: .slideUp() & .slideDown()
item.description: .slideUp() & .slideDown() Methods Methods used to hide or show the HTML elements by gradually decreasing or increasing their height .slideUp() Example $(() => { $("button").click(() => { // slide #box element up with duration of 2 secs $("#box").slideUp(2000) }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com .slideDown() Example $(() => { $("button").click(() => { // slide #box element down $("#box").slideDown() }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.

item.title: .slideToggle()
item.description: .slideToggle() Method Method that toggles between the slideUp() and slideDown() methods Example $(() => { $("button").click(() => { // slide toggle #box element $("#box").slideToggle() }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com

item.title: .fadeIn() & .fadeOut()
item.description: .fadeIn() & .fadeOut() Methods Methods used to display or hide the HTML elements by gradually increasing or decreasing their opacity .fadeIn() Example $(() => { $("button").click(() => { // fade in #box element; duration 1 sec $("#box").fadeIn(1000) }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com .fadeOut() Example $(() => { $("button").click(() => { // fade out #box element; duration 3 sec $("#box").fadeOut(3000) }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.

item.title: Other Effects
item.description: Other Effects There are many other effects available, click here to see a complete list of jQuery Effects
